participant_1.background:
I spent hours walking around the city after my kids went to bed.
I don't dye my hair because I'm too busy working to save up for my dream car.
My weight is not relevant to this question.
I love my family and I'm sure they would love me no matter what.
My comfortable recliner is my most valued material possession because it gives me a place to relax and recharge after a long day of traveling.

participant_2.background:
I drive an expensive car that I bought with my own money.
i am a baseball player.
After I quit my job, I used my free time to start rock collecting and making macaroni art.
I love the feeling of creating something beautiful, and I find that jewelry design is a great way to express my creativity.
i have a hard time feeling connected with people.

content.text: What's your favorite thing to do when you're bored?
I like to make jewelry. It's a great way to express my creativity and it feels really good to create something beautiful.
That's really cool! Do you sell your jewelry?
I haven't yet, but I've been thinking about it.
You should! I'm sure people would love to buy your work.
Thanks! I'll look into it.
What's your favorite type of jewelry to make?
I really like making earrings. They're a little more challenging than necklaces or bracelets, but I think they're more fun to wear.
I can imagine! They're definitely a statement piece.
Exactly!
Do you have any other hobbies?
I also like to collect rocks. I find it really relaxing to go out and look for new rocks.
That's really cool! I've never really been into rock collecting, but I can see how it would be relaxing.
It's a great way to get outside and explore.
What's your favorite kind of rock?
I like amethysts the best. They're so pretty!
I've never seen an amethyst in person.
You should! They're really beautiful.
Maybe I'll go looking for one sometime.
You should
